entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McCreary
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:56 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:56 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:56 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
